name: Propitious Screen: Fleet Feathers Against Emerald Waves
description: A folding screen delicately crafted by the most skillful artisans. Its frame is made from Sandbearer Wood with a vermillion finish, and the finest silk was selected as its fabric. Among the multitude of splendid decorations at the Lantern Rite, this folding screen can be considered a rare masterpiece. The painting on it depicts rolling waves and soaring sea-birds, and it seems to symbolize great ambitions for the future...
